content.heroIntro:
PANORAMA BEACH represents a stunning new residential development by IBERO HOMES, strategically positioned in the heart of Centro, Torrevieja. This exclusive project offers 6 carefully designed units featuring modern penthouses and apartments, with prices starting from just €230,000—making it an exceptional value proposition in one of Costa Blanca's most sought-after locations. Combining contemporary architecture with premium finishes, PANORAMA BEACH delivers the perfect blend of lifestyle and investment potential, with completion targeted for September 1st, 2026.

Torrevieja has become Spain's largest expat community, where English is widely spoken and international living is seamlessly integrated into daily life. PANORAMA BEACH capitalizes on this thriving cosmopolitan atmosphere, offering 2-bedroom penthouses and apartments ranging from 25 to 58 square meters of meticulously planned living space. Each unit is designed to maximize comfort and functionality, featuring modern amenities and quality finishes that appeal to both owner-occupiers and savvy investors seeking rental income potential.

The development's Centro location provides unparalleled access to Torrevieja's vibrant lifestyle. Within minutes, residents enjoy pristine beaches including the Blue Flag-awarded Playa del Cura, world-class golf courses at Villamartín just 15 minutes away, and comprehensive healthcare facilities including the 24-hour Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja. IBERO HOMES' reputation for quality construction ensures PANORAMA BEACH will become a landmark residential destination in this dynamic Mediterranean community.

locationSection.intro: Centro Torrevieja is the pulsing heart of this vibrant Mediterranean coastal town, offering an unmatched combination of urban convenience, beach lifestyle, and cosmopolitan charm. This prime location attracts international residents seeking the perfect balance between amenities and authentic Spanish living. The Centro district seamlessly blends residential tranquility with proximity to world-class healthcare, excellent shopping facilities, and immediate access to some of Costa Blanca's finest beaches. Torrevieja's largest expat community means English-speaking services are universally available, from banking to healthcare to dining. The area benefits from excellent transport connections, with regular bus services linking to Alicante, Murcia, and coastal destinations. PANORAMA BEACH's Centro positioning makes it ideal for those wanting immediate beach access combined with urban sophistication—a rare find in today's property market.
